amendment.description: An amendment numbered 35 printed in Part B of House Report 118-535 to increase and decrease funding for grants for construction of State Extended Care Facilities to focus on creating or maintaining nursing homes for Americas World War II, Korean, and Vietnam Veterans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
